OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: I can't believe they did that.
Anyway. We need to lie low on this for a while. Best not to be in contact for a bit.
Thankyou for your help. You made a real difference with this.
I'll take care of the cleanup for all this. You were connected to that plane, so you should stay out of those servers for a while. I'll make sure there's no trace.
Ah, and, I found this in this server's setup config. Looks like it'll reset your UI and remove Kaguya's trackers.
It's been a pleasure working with you, #PLAYERNAME#. Good luck, take care.
